name: Seven Seas Swizzle
instructions:
1. Build all the ingredients in the appropriate glass and add half the amount of necessary ice. 
2. Swizzle until the glass is cool.
3. Top with ice and garnish.
description: In his recipe, Nick Batavia plays with green tea syrup and lime, for a riff on the Queen Park Swizzle with traditional punch ingredients.
garnish: Mint bouquet and dusting of nutmeg

ingredients.name: Arrack
ingredients.description: Arrack is a distilled alcoholic drink typically produced in India, Sri Lanka and Southeast Asia, made from the fermented sap of coconut flowers or sugarcane, and also with grain (e.g. red rice) or fruit depending upon the country of origin.

ingredients.name: Simple Syrup
ingredients.description: Syrup made with sugar and water. Usually in 1:1 or 2:1 ratio.

ingredients.name: Orange bitters
ingredients.description: Orange bitters is a form of bitters, a cocktail flavoring made from such ingredients as the peels of Seville oranges, cardamom, caraway seed, coriander, anise, and burnt sugar in an alcohol base.
